website_summaries.verdict: Quick-cook model that is affordable and maintains optimal temperature for consistently even baking.
pros: Easy to cook multiple batches of donuts
Cooks so quickly that certain consumers report they bought this model to keep in the office break room to enjoy fresh donuts at lunchtime
Safe design reduces likelihood of accidentally burning yourself
cons: Difficult to clean, and some reports of plates not retaining their heat after around a year of use

customer_reviews.title: this was purchased off Amazon i am not even sure how many yrs i have had it....
customer_reviews.text: I know i have had it for at least 8 yrs...And it is still working great...and has saved me alot of money...i get chocolate chip muffin mix and add a couple tablespoons of Cocoa..u end up with wonderful chocolate donuts that dont even need frosting...they are even better the 2nd day..if the grand's and adults havent finished them off..Bella makes great products...i now have the bella expresso machine and hopefully it will last as long as this cute little red donut maker has..
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Gibbins

customer_reviews.title: Everyone loves Donuts
customer_reviews.text: This looks brand new! The box hardly had a scratch on it. This is a gift so I wont know yet how it works but there were so many positive reviews I trust it will be fine.
customer_reviews.author: DebbieG

customer_reviews.title: I'll keep trying and seeing what works best.
customer_reviews.text: Cooks donuts really well but probably too fast. By the time you can pour in the batter and close the lid, the bottom side of the donuts are on their way to being done. I had a mix of undercooked donuts and cooked donuts with one side slightly burnt. I'll keep trying and seeing what works best.
customer_reviews.author: roofyren

customer_reviews.title: Good Little Machine
customer_reviews.text: I bought my pon4i4nica (russian for "donut maker") despite the negative reviews and was right to do so. Nothing sticks, basic batter recipe can use some improvement, the machine does not get too hot during baking. About sticking - it only sticks when you use too little oil. If you compare the health impact of donuts baked with 3 tbsp of oil and deep fried - the choice is obvious. Good luck and happy baking time to you!
customer_reviews.author: amazing customer

customer_reviews.title: This is addictive
customer_reviews.text: I have been passing this around the office for people to try and they all can't get enough of it. I barely got to use it but it makes perfect little donuts and the more you make the faster they cook. You can use cake batter and almost get 3 dozen donuts from one cake mix.
customer_reviews.author: David C Galvan

customer_reviews.title: I am shocked
customer_reviews.text: The box looked old, once i opened the machine had oil all over and inside the machine there were pieces of donuts. Literally someone took it from their kitchen and send it to me. Cant believe that i got this . Very dissapointed
customer_reviews.author: natali

customer_reviews.title: Do nut time
customer_reviews.text: Defiantly worth theoney super easy to use works great love it
customer_reviews.author: Nids

customer_reviews.title: I love this so much
customer_reviews.text: I love this so much!!! Quick easy alternative to greasy donuts and this little machine is a dream!!!!! Quick fast hot fresh donuts anytime without guilt, what a deal.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa A Ibrahim

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: works well...box was damaged so it was hard to give as a gift but it worked fine
customer_reviews.author: rknick

customer_reviews.title: Lousy Donut Maker
customer_reviews.text: This cheap donut maker isn't worth the money! I burned my finger opening it and found out the heated elments is right next to the handle!! The donuts were lousy but maybe because of the batter. They cooked on one side darker than the other. I have it available to sell in my next garage sale if anyone is interested ($10 plus shipping).
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: Bella Cucina 13466 Donut Maker
customer_reviews.text: My wife makes donuts with our 6 year old grandson every time he comes to visit and he loves them. It's the first thing he asks for when he comes over. They mix the batter together and he helps her cook them.
customer_reviews.author: PAE

customer_reviews.title: Grandkids Love It!
customer_reviews.text: Sent this for my three youngest grandsons. It reminded me of when my mother, little sister, and I used to make donuts in hot oil. My daughter said that using it was easy and the boys loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Simon Tanar

customer_reviews.title: Fun and taste great!!
customer_reviews.text: This is so fun! My grandkids love making the donuts!! My 13 and 11 year old grandsons liked it so much, I bought them both one!! Donuts taste great!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Be careful ordering third party items.
customer_reviews.text: Very use looking had scratches and was not in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Christmas Gift for 5 Year Old
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I got this for my son for christmas. He really likes to help cook and do other "grown up" things around the house. He loves to mix up the batter for the donuts, and enjoys letting watching the light on the top to let me know when it changes colors. For $12 dollars you can not beat it. Great shipping, great price, great product!
customer_reviews.author: Cody Breunig

customer_reviews.title: We love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great price for nice donut maker :) kids love to make donuts avery week and they taste really good:) would recommend it to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: madajka

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was a big hit when it came to party snacks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My kids love using this to make different kinds of doughnuts! Easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Hodge

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Makes great homemade donuts. My husband is in hog heaven
customer_reviews.author: Wanda Holden

customer_reviews.title: More like a toy
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed in this doughnut maker.. the taste of them is okay but I felt like a kid with an easy bake oven.. tiny amounts of batter to make very thin cupcake tasting doughnuts and most of the recipes require ingredients you don't have on hand plus all the recipes require a LOT of sugar.. I'll be giving this away to some kid to play with.
customer_reviews.author: Posh

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, good price
customer_reviews.text: This is easy to use and makes OK mini donuts in just minutes. Kids and teens seemed to enjoy the end product. I found that the donuts did not cook evenly so some parts looked brown and other pale but my kids ate them just the same.
customer_reviews.author: Big Pablo

customer_reviews.title: Gift for Grandson
customer_reviews.text: Who loves it, he uses it every weekend and is absolutely pleased with it. He is very happy with this item
customer_reviews.author: pitsy

customer_reviews.title: Wife is happy
customer_reviews.text: My wife wanted a doughnut make this was inexpensive and works good though very small doughnuts are produced I'm nat a cake doughnut person but these were not bad after adding blue Barrie's and topping with syrup
customer_reviews.author: scott Tschantz

customer_reviews.title: Fast and delicious!
customer_reviews.text: I love this donut maker, is easy, fast and delicious. I made the recipe in the box, the donuts were delicious, soft and super fast, un just 4 minutes are ready to enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: sandra de game

customer_reviews.title: ... a bit smaller then you would think· its a nice inexpensive though
customer_reviews.text: its a very cute machine i got for my sister but is a bit smaller then you would think· its a nice inexpensive though!
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Liptak

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Works great with my low-carb, grain-free recipes. You have to watch it closely and not walk away, but if you check it often nothing burns. I've used it 3 times so far and no problems. No sticking if you brush with oil first.
customer_reviews.author: BohoBear

customer_reviews.title: Rob Gronkowski fan
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product! May slightly burn on bottom of donut. As long as you follow the recipes that they give you. I like to make donuts in the morning on weekends. I recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: pancetta

customer_reviews.title: Bella Cucina Donut Maker
customer_reviews.text: The Donut Maker works ok - But so far donuts don't look or taste like donuts Product does clean very easily
customer_reviews.author: Lena Cost

customer_reviews.title: Product mislead
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product thinking it was a regular donut maker. When my husband opened it for Christmas we found out it was a mini donut maker which it did not say when I bought. We decided to keep it anyway and used it once and it was terrible. Donuts just look like little saucers there is no plumpness to them or anything. I am extremely dissappointed in amazon for misleading this product.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssag343

customer_reviews.title: The machine and the donuts it produces are much smaller ...
customer_reviews.text: The machine and the donuts it produces are much smaller than a standard donuts. This should called a mini-donut maker in the product title instead of disclosed in the product description.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Bella Cucina Mini Donut Maker
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little donut maker. You can bake donuts super fast. I had a couple dozen donuts baked and decorated within an hour. These are a hit too, everyone loves them! Very fast and easy.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Hogerheide

customer_reviews.title: Not Good!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mom and she is not happy with it at all. The doughnuts are way too small and hard to get out
customer_reviews.author: dayraykit

customer_reviews.title: do nut maker
customer_reviews.text: This product broke right after I got it and I tried to get help but the company said I did not answer them and I did with a picture. They never answered me after I sent the photo and so I gave them a truthful review and they got upset and said they would do nothing else to help me. So I am stuck with a broke do nut maker that isn't even safe to use. Do not buy from this seller. If this was eBay I would have a new one by now. But it seams I am just out my money. Buyer beware I guess.
customer_reviews.author: marlenedg

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: First I thought what a great gift it would make for doughnut lovers who want a healthier option. The device is smaller than expected so I kept it and I'm going to try it for Super Bowl weekend
customer_reviews.author: DJ Meyer

customer_reviews.title: IT's OK.
customer_reviews.text: I followed the recipe and figured out how long to cook the donuts for. They came out OK but pretty bland. I'll try some other recipes to see if they taste any better. Not too difficult to clean.
customer_reviews.author: machita

customer_reviews.title: MMM Donuts...
customer_reviews.text: Donuts are great. The maker comes with easy to read instructions. The only thing I was unimpressed with was how small they were. This isn't really a problem because they only take 7 minutes a batch to make, but it would have been nice to know they were bite size instead of just small.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Brodhagen

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says it will.
customer_reviews.text: Does what it says it will. Provides a few good recipes. Donuts are small, a couple of bites big, but healthier with no frying, and easy to remove. Easy cleanup. Minimal storage space required.
customer_reviews.author: Swaffar

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Given as a gift. Recipient very pleased with product. Easy to use, good recipes, and great tasting donuts. I would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: just me

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size mini donuts &fun for little ones to make &decorate. Got it for Valentines Day since it was red - a great hit.
customer_reviews.author: Robbi Larson

customer_reviews.title: half baked
customer_reviews.text: I'm wrapping it to send back. I followed one of their recipes and out came "donuts" that were partially burned on the bottom, and uncooked on the top. Not edible. I'm back to making them the old fashioned way.
customer_reviews.author: Lolo

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely LOVE this!!
customer_reviews.text: I can make mini donuts in no time with this!! Super easy and super fast!! The kids love them and I can be as creative as I want with different flavours and decorations. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my daughter-in-law for Christmas. She is loving it and has tried some very healthy donuts for her family.
customer_reviews.author: S. DeBoer

customer_reviews.title: This is a "Mini" donut maker!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a "donut" maker, this item didn't say it was a "Mini" donut maker. When I got it, it said it on the box. I was disappointed! The product works fine, it's just not what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Johnna Vogele

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Ok I guess but nothing special. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Linda G.

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: For its size it is ok, the grandkids like to make these and enjoy the time eating as well. Wolud recomend this.
customer_reviews.author: jeff

customer_reviews.title: Not the best!
customer_reviews.text: Tried it out for first time. OK...but not the greatest! Not impressed and would not buy again. but, what expect for the $. don't think will use very much. donuts on top not done well. even after using tips from reviews. would not recommend. will take time to get just right I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Diamond

customer_reviews.title: So-So Appliance
customer_reviews.text: This countertop appliance bakes hotter on the bottom than on the top, making for uneven results and requires turning the donuts for even browning.
customer_reviews.author: sheryl austin

customer_reviews.title: Heating
customer_reviews.text: will not heat up to where the green light will go on. I'm not sure what temperature it get to as there is no way to tell
customer_reviews.author: Delbert  Mecum

customer_reviews.title: fun
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun sunday morning item that the kids like to make to go along with there pancakes and eggs
customer_reviews.author: FJohnson

customer_reviews.title: too small
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product but when they say mini,they mean mini but works super good but i would like it better if it had an off and on switch
customer_reviews.author: becky johnson

customer_reviews.title: Small little tasty donuts!
customer_reviews.text: I read prior reviews that many did NOT like this donut maker. I was a little upset when I received it and it was a "mini", however, after the partial refund was offered.... I decided to keep it. The donuts from the basic donut recipe came out perfect! We made some dipped in butter and cinnamon sugar and then again the next day, with glazed. I LOVE IT! Highly recommended, I am not sure why people are saying their donuts are "runny". If you follow the instructions for recipes that came with it... It works great!
customer_reviews.author: rpatrick1

customer_reviews.title: Family fun
customer_reviews.text: I gave these as gifts to my daughter and grandkids. They love them and are fun at parties as you can make donuts with a cake mix and eat them hot out of the maker.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

product_meta.title: Bella Cucina 13466 Donut Maker
product_meta.description: Make delicious mini donuts at home, Healthier choice, no deep frying, Makes 7 mini donuts, Easy to use, Power and ready indicator light for easy cooking, Non-stick baking tray for easy clean up.
feature_bullets: Make delicious mini donuts at home
Non-stick baking tray for easy clean up

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars108 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars

categories: Electric Cake Pop & Mini Cake Makers
